sentences.sContent: It burns itself out instantly after the match is lit but generates enough heat to ignite the aspen shank.
sentences.sContent_eng: It burns itself out instantly after the match is lit but generates enough heat to ignite the aspen shank.
sentences.sCn: 在火柴点着之后，它就立即烧光了，但是产生的热量足以点燃山杨做的火柴棍。

sentences.sContent: The aspen and its golden leaves - this is the "signature tree" that most people think of on a Colorado fall colors tour.
sentences.sContent_eng: The aspen and its golden leaves - this is the "signature tree" that most people think of on a Colorado fall colors tour.
sentences.sCn: 山杨树和它的黄金色的树叶- 大多数人认为这些树是科罗拉多州秋天的彩色旅游的“信号树”。

synos.tran: [林]山杨的；类似白杨的；颤抖的

remMethod.val: as + pen(笔) → 像笔一样直的树木 → 白杨

trans.tranCn: 山杨的；类似白杨的；颤抖的

trans.tranOther: a type of tree from western North America with leaves that shake a lot in the wind
